description: Collect Slate and Marble to upgrade your Building Enhancements.  Building Enhancements permanently improve your House Stats.

costs.description: Slate is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events.
costs.name: Slate

costs.description: Marble is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events and leaderboards.
costs.name: Marble

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Brick

costs.description:
Lumber from the northern soldier pine trees. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Soldier Pine

costs.description:
Specially constructed building blocks, central to holding up elaborate structures. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
costs.name: Keystone

costs.description: Extremely durable construction material, said to be harder than any other known stone. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.
costs.name: Valyrian Stone

costs.name: Slate

Lumber from the northern soldier pine trees. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Soldier Pine

costs.description:
Specially constructed building blocks, central to holding up elaborate structures. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
costs.name: Keystone

costs.description: Extremely durable construction material, said to be harder than any other known stone. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.
costs.name: Valyrian Stone

costs.description: Slate is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events.
costs.name: Slate

costs.description: Marble is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events and leaderboards.
costs.name: Marble

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.

costs.name: Valyrian Stone

costs.description: Slate is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events.
costs.name: Slate

costs.description: Marble is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events and leaderboards.
costs.name: Marble

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Brick

costs.description:
Lumber from the northern soldier pine trees. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Soldier Pine

costs.description:
Specially constructed building blocks, central to holding up elaborate structures. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
costs.name: Keystone

costs.description: Extremely durable construction material, said to be harder than any other known stone. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.
costs.name: Valyrian Stone

costs.description: Slate is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events.
costs.name: Slate

costs.description: Marble is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events and leaderboards.
costs.name: Marble

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Brick

costs.description:
Lumber from the northern soldier pine trees. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Soldier Pine

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
costs.name: Keystone

costs.description: Extremely durable construction material, said to be harder than any other known stone. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.
costs.name: Valyrian Stone

costs.description: Slate is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events.
costs.name: Slate

costs.description: Marble is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events and leaderboards.
costs.name: Marble

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Brick

costs.description:
Lumber from the northern soldier pine trees. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Soldier Pine

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.

Specially constructed building blocks, central to holding up elaborate structures. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
costs.name: Keystone

costs.description: Extremely durable construction material, said to be harder than any other known stone. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.
costs.name: Valyrian Stone

costs.description: Slate is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events.
costs.name: Slate

costs.description: Marble is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events and leaderboards.
costs.name: Marble

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Brick

costs.description:
Lumber from the northern soldier pine trees. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
costs.name: Keystone

costs.description: Extremely durable construction material, said to be harder than any other known stone. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.
costs.name: Valyrian Stone

costs.description: Slate is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events.
costs.name: Slate

costs.description: Marble is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events and leaderboards.
costs.name: Marble

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Brick

costs.description:
Lumber from the northern soldier pine trees. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Soldier Pine

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Brick

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Soldier Pine

costs.description:
Specially constructed building blocks, central to holding up elaborate structures. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
costs.name: Keystone

costs.description: Extremely durable construction material, said to be harder than any other known stone. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.
costs.name: Valyrian Stone

costs.description: Slate is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events.
costs.name: Slate

costs.description: Marble is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events and leaderboards.
costs.name: Marble

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Brick

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
costs.name: Keystone

costs.description: Extremely durable construction material, said to be harder than any other known stone. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.
costs.name: Valyrian Stone

costs.description: Slate is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events.
costs.name: Slate

costs.description: Marble is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events and leaderboards.
costs.name: Marble

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Brick

costs.description:
Lumber from the northern soldier pine trees. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.

Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.

costs.name: Slate

costs.description: Marble is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events and leaderboards.
costs.name: Marble

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Brick

costs.description:
Lumber from the northern soldier pine trees. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Soldier Pine

costs.description:

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.

Specially constructed building blocks, central to holding up elaborate structures. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
costs.name: Keystone

costs.description: Extremely durable construction material, said to be harder than any other known stone. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.
costs.name: Valyrian Stone

name: Wall Enhancement 1

stat.description: Infantry Defense in Player-to-Player combat.
stat.name: Infantry Defense vs. Player

description: Collect Slate and Marble to upgrade your Building Enhancements.  Building Enhancements permanently improve your House Stats.

costs.description: Slate is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events.
costs.name: Slate

costs.description: Marble is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events and leaderboards.
costs.name: Marble

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Brick

costs.description:

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.

Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
costs.name: Keystone

costs.description: Extremely durable construction material, said to be harder than any other known stone. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.
costs.name: Valyrian Stone

costs.description: Slate is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events.
costs.name: Slate

costs.description: Marble is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events and leaderboards.
costs.name: Marble

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Brick

costs.description:
Lumber from the northern soldier pine trees. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Soldier Pine

Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.

costs.description: Slate is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events.
costs.name: Slate

costs.description: Marble is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events and leaderboards.
costs.name: Marble

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Brick

costs.description:
Lumber from the northern soldier pine trees. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
costs.name: Keystone

costs.description: Extremely durable construction material, said to be harder than any other known stone. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.
costs.name: Valyrian Stone

costs.description: Slate is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events.
costs.name: Slate

costs.description: Marble is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events and leaderboards.
costs.name: Marble

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Brick

costs.description:
Lumber from the northern soldier pine trees. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Soldier Pine

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
